game.name: Solar Ash
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 수상 경력에 빛나는 Hyper Light Drifter의 제작자가 고속, 중력 변화의 세계 Solar Ash를 선사합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the creators of the award-winning Hyper Light Drifter comes the high-speed and gravity-bending world of Solar Ash.

reviewHighlights.text: The game is solid, though I can't help but feel sad that I didn't love it as much as I expected. The atmosphere, sound design, and visuals were a cons...
For the 36 euro price this is a no go, I don't want to be mean since it seems like the team behind was farily passionate but the game does a poor job...
